name: Crazy Machines Model File
summary: Learn about .UCM files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: UCM files are installed to the \​data\​models\​ folder within the Crazy Machines installation directory.

description: Game model file created by Crazy Machines, an puzzle game that utilizes physics-based contraptions; saves a model for the game, which is used for displaying one of the game objects or contraptions; becomes animated when an experiment is run.
